body: MIME is a protocol that:

choices.W: determines a server's IP address from a domain name
choices.X: translates binary files to text-based email messaging

choices.Z: sets a specification for digital transmission of data over an analog phone line

If an object were to fall in each of the following 3 locations, in which location would it have the slowest acceleration due to gravity and in which would it have the fastest acceleration due to gravity: Pikes Peak; North Pole; and Denver, Colorado
answer: SLOWEST = PIKES PEAK; FASTEST = NORTH POLE

answer: N-DODECANOIC ACID, N-OCTADECANOIC ACID, N-EICOSONOIC ACID
